p: Plerixafor dosing was timed to allow a 10–11-h interval between dosing on Day 4 and the initiation of apheresis on Day 5. Following a dose of G-CSF 10 μg/kg SC 1 h (±15 min) prior, standard apheresis was performed using three blood volumes (±10%). The same regimen was administered (i.e., plerixafor administration in the evening and G-CSF 1 h prior to apheresis the following morning) for a maximum of four aphereses or until ≥5 × 10 6 CD34 + cells/kg had been collected. The decision to continue treatment and apheresis was based on the cumulative cell yield/kg after each apheresis session.
